sourcesContent:
//import Vector from '../images/Vector.svg';
//import './index.css';
import React from 'react';
import Header from '../components/Header'
import Main from '../components/Main'
import Footer from '../components/Footer'

function App() {
    function handleEditAvatarClick() {
        document.querySelector('.popup_type_avatar').classList.add('popup_opened');
    };


    const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setIsEditProfilePopupOpen] = React.useState(false)

    function handleEditProfileClick() {
        //document.querySelector('.popup_type_edit').classList.add('popup_opened');
        setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(true)
    }

    //isOpen={isEditProfilePopupOpen}

    function handleAddPlaceClick() {
        document.querySelector('.popup_type_add-card').classList.add('popup_opened');
    };

    return ( <
        div className = "App" >
        <
        body className = "wrapper" >
        <
        div className = "page" >
        <
        Header / >
        <
        Main onEditProfile = { handleEditProfileClick }
        onAddPlace = { handleAddPlaceClick }
        onEditAvatar = { handleEditAvatarClick }
        /> <
        Footer / >
        <
        PopupWithForm isOpen = { isEditProfilePopupOpen }
        /> <
        div className = "popup popup_type_edit" >

        <
        div className = "popup__container" >
        <
        button type = "button"
        className = "popup__close" > < /button> <
        h2 className = "popup__text" > Редактировать профиль < /h2> <
        form action = "submit"
        className = "popup__form"
        name = "edit"
        novalidate >
        <
        input type = "text"
        value = "Имя"
        placeholder = "Имя"
        className = "popup__input popup__input_type_name"
        name = "name"
        id = "nameInput"
        minlength = "2"
        maxlength = "40"
        required / >
        <
        span className = "popup__error"
        id = "nameInput-error" > < /span> <
        input type = "text"
        value = "Описание"
        placeholder = "Описание"
        className = "popup__input  popup__input_type_job"
        name = "about"
        id = "jobInput"
        minlength = "2"
        maxlength = "200"
        required / >
        <
        span className = "popup__error"
        id = "jobInput-error" > < /span> <
        button type = "submit"
        className = "popup__save" > Сохранить < /button> <
        /form> <
        /div> <
        /div>

        <
        div className = "popup popup_type_add-card" >

        <
        div className = "popup__container" >
        <
        button type = "button"
        className = "popup__close" > < /button> <
        h2 className = "popup__text" > Новое место < /h2> <
        form action = "submit"
        className = "popup__form"
        name = "card"
        novalidate >
        <
        input type = "text"
        placeholder = "Название"
        className = "popup__input popup__input_type_card-name"
        name = "name"
        id = "cardname-input"
        minlength = "2"
        maxlength = "30"
        required / >
        <
        span className = "popup__error"
        id = "cardname-input-error" > < /span> <
        input type = "url"
        placeholder = "Ссылка на картинку"
        className = "popup__input  popup__input_type_card-link"
        name = "link"
        id = "link-input"
        required / >
        <
        span className = "popup__error"
        id = "link-input-error" > < /span> <
        button type = "submit"
        disabled = "true"
        className = "popup__save" > Создать < /button> <
        /form> <
        /div> <
        /div>

        <
        div className = "popup popup_type_delete-confirm" >

        <
        div className = "popup__container popup__container_type_delete" >
        <
        button type = "button"
        className = "popup__close" > < /button> <
        form action = "submit"
        className = "popup__form popup__form_delete"
        name = "delete"
        novalidate >
        <
        h2 className = "popup__text popup__text_delete" > Вы уверены ? < /h2> <
        button type = "submit"
        className = "popup__save popup__save_confirmation" > Да < /button> <
        /form> <
        /div> <
        /div>

        <
        div className = "popup popup_type_avatar" >

        <
        div className = "popup__container " >
        <
        button type = "button"
        className = "popup__close" > < /button> <
        h2 className = "popup__text " > Обновить аватар < /h2> <
        form action = "submit"
        className = "popup__form "
        name = "avatarForm"
        novalidate >
        <
        input type = "url"
        placeholder = "Обновить аватар"
        className = "popup__input popup__input_type_avatar"
        name = "avatar"
        id = "editAvatar"
        required / >
        <
        span className = "popup__error"
        id = "editAvatar-error" > < /span> <
        button type = "submit"
        className = "popup__save " > Сохранить < /button> <
        /form> <
        /div> <
        /div>

        <
        template className = "card-template" >
        <
        div className = "card__elements" >
        <
        button className = "card__delete" > < /button> <
        img src = "#"
        className = "card__photo"
        alt = "" / >
        <
        div className = "card__text" >
        <
        h2 className = "card__tittle" > < /h2> <
        div className = "card__column" >
        <
        button type = "button"
        className = "card__like" > < /button> <
        span className = "card__like-count" > < /span> <
        /div> <
        /div> <
        /div> <
        /template> <
        /div> <
        /body> <
        /div>
    );
}

export default App;
